title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Blended Learning for Indigenous Knowledge and Sustainability Capabilities

context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze indigenous knowledge systems and describe at least three strategies for strengthening sustainability competencies
Learners develop and share action plans to achieve environmental, social, and economic sustainability goals in corporate settings
Learners apply critical thinking to sustainability problem-solving by comparing diverse worldviews
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
